verbs.description: Fear and loathing ! [V: Get] [ARG1: your red hot fear and loathing] [ARGM-LOC: here] ! No need to trouble your weary mind with any of those vexing intellectual questions about what crimes Trump , members of his administration , and/or his campaign staff may have committed ....
